flixel.input.gamepad.OUYAButtonID

type
class
Button IDs for OUYA controllers

Static Variables

A(inline,null) : Int

HOME(inline,null) : Int

LB(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_ANALOGUE(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_ANALOGUE_X(inline,null) : Int

Axis array indicies If TRIGGER axis returns value > 0 then LT is being pressed, and if it's < 0 then RT is being pressed

LEFT_ANALOGUE_Y(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_TRIGGER(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_TRIGGER_ANALOG(inline,null) : Int

Button IDs (DPAD values are obtained from FlxGamepad.hat)

RIGHT_ANALOGUE_X(inline,null) : Int

RIGHT_ANALOGUE_Y(inline,null) : Int

RIGHT_TRIGGER(inline,null) : Int
